underlying_goal: Implement the remaining data pipeline (Delta Staging → Pub/Sub → Cloud Run → CloudSQL) for the A-2 Reverse ETL pattern PoC, including Terraform, CI, and Taskfile setup
friction_detail: Multiple CI failures due to ruff lint/format violations, unused imports, mypy type errors, and tflint issues that required iterative fixing; also file read/write hooks blocked some tool usage.
brief_summary: User asked to implement a large multi-file plan for a Reverse ETL PoC pipeline including Terraform, Cloud Run service, CI, and Taskfile; Claude completed the implementation but required multiple rounds of CI fix iterations.
